com.dalphin.engine.player

Class Player2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.dalphin.engine.player.Player2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestPlayer

    public class Player2D
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player2D(TextureManager textureManager)
      This constructor creates a player by passing in a texture manager as it will be needed to set the texture of the player (typing this I realize it should just be a texture)
      Player2D(TextureManager textureManager, java.lang.String name)
      Creates the player using a constructor that takes in the TextureManager and the Player name
      Player2D(TextureManager textureManager, java.lang.String name, float moveSpeed)
      Creates the player using a constructor that takes in a TextureManager, a Name and the Player Move Speed
      Player2D(TextureManager textureManager, java.lang.String name, float moveSpeed, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture)
      Creates a player using a constructor that takes in a TextureManager, Name, moveSpeed, and Player Texture
